overview.randingCardTitle:
You can see images in Paintee.
Paintee is not difficult to use.
overview.randingCardContents:
Paintee is full of images,
where you can be an author, and it is easy to have those as well.
We all had a lovely moment spending time with pictures.
Here today, you can recall the moment by having an image that makes you happy.
overview.randingCardTitle2: You can have any image at $2 USD.
overview.randingCardContents2:
No matter where you are, where you send. You don’t need to spend more than $2 USD.
What you need is spending $2 USD only to send an image to anyone you want with a short message.
That image with a message from you is surely more valuable than anything.
overview.randingCardTitle3: Be an author and talk to others.
overview.randingCardContents3:
How about becoming an author? Isn’t it super exciting to have someone like your image?
Upload your image, then people can have a personalized postcard with your image.
We help you do all these things, and pay you back a percentage for your image sold.

post.randingCardTitle1: You can get any image you want.
post.randingCardContents1: You can get all images in Paintee as a postcard form. Just click 'Post it' button. It is simple to have images. Purchase history will be saved in My History.
post.randingCardContents2: You can send the postcard to yourself, or it can be other person. Please enter the exact address and doublecheck it.
post.randingCardTitle3: What do you think? What message do you want to share?
post.randingCardContents3: What does this image mean to you? Please share your message. Your message will be delivered with the image.
post.randingCardTitle4: $2 USD is all you have to pay.
post.randingCardContents4: No additional shipping fee is required. You can send anywhere with $2 USD only.
post.randingCardTitle5: Please wait, it takes a while.
post.randingCardContents5: All purchased postcards will be delivered through regular mail. We won't be able to guarantee specific delivery date. Please wait a while. If it is not delivered even within 30 days, please let us know.
post.randingCardTitle6: Your support will be a lot to the authors.
post.randingCardContents6: Part of your $2 USD support will be contributed to the authors for the sponsorship. It will be a great encouragement to the author of your postcard.

upload.randingCardTitle1: Your image will become a postcard.
upload.randingCardContents1: It will truly be a postcard, which delivers a message to the people in the world with your artwork printed.
upload.randingCardTitle2: You can upload only one image for now.
upload.randingCardContents2: We are managing the maximum number of upload images. For now, you may upload one image.
upload.randingCardTitle3:
Your image needs to be sold for five times
in order to upload one more image.
upload.randingCardContents3: Your image needs to be sold for five times in order to upload one more image. If your image gets many likes, you can upload more images.
upload.randingCardTitle4: Enough size of image is needed.
upload.randingCardContents4: Enough size of image is needed to make a real postcard. Please prepare an image larger than 1080 x 1920 pixel.
upload.randingCardContents5: We offer all of postcards at $2 USD.We set the lowest price pictures for everyone to experience more images
upload.randingCardTitle6: 25% of selling price will be paid back to you.
upload.randingCardContents6: You can get $0.5 USD of rewards per one postcard sold. Collect your reward to get the actual money back. You can share your artworks with people all over the world.

purchasePop1.contents:
Now is the beta test period. We will begin service shortly.


Send 3 free postcards till beta test period over.
Only $2 USD, you can have any images since commercial service.

Please click ‘Payment’ button to continue.
